trans-unit.source: This abstract class defines the base worker methods and enumerations used by ASP.NET managed code to process requests.
trans-unit.target: 此抽象類別定義的基本人員方法和 ASP.NET managed 程式碼處理要求所使用的列舉。

trans-unit.source: In most cases, your code will not deal with HttpWorkerRequest directly because request and response data are exposed through the <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest> and <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse> classes.
trans-unit.target: 在大部分情況下，您的程式碼將會不處理 HttpWorkerRequest 直接公開會透過要求和回應資料因為<xref:System.Web.HttpRequest>和<xref:System.Web.HttpResponse>類別。</xref:System.Web.HttpResponse> </xref:System.Web.HttpRequest>

trans-unit.source: Some internal ASP.NET classes extend this class.
trans-unit.target: 某些內部 ASP.NET 類別延伸此類別。

trans-unit.source: If your code implements its own hosting environment, it will need to extend this class to call the <xref:System.Web.HttpRuntime.ProcessRequest%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果您的程式碼實作自己的主控環境，它將需要擴充此類別來呼叫<xref:System.Web.HttpRuntime.ProcessRequest%2A>方法。</xref:System.Web.HttpRuntime.ProcessRequest%2A>

trans-unit.source: In addition, your code could create a derived class for the purpose of child-request execution within a given application in order to pass its instance to <xref:System.Web.HttpRuntime.ProcessRequest%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 此外，您的程式碼可以建立衍生的類別，以指定的應用程式，才能將其執行個體傳遞給<xref:System.Web.HttpRuntime.ProcessRequest%2A>.</xref:System.Web.HttpRuntime.ProcessRequest%2A>內的子要求執行

trans-unit.source: In this case, the derived class should keep a reference to the current HttpWorkerRequest and delegate most of the methods to it.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，衍生的類別應該保留目前 HttpWorkerRequest 的參考，以及委派大部分的方法。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.HttpWorkerRequest"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Web.HttpWorkerRequest"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: The HttpWorkerRequest constructor is the default constructor for the <xref:System.Web.HttpWorkerRequest> class.
trans-unit.target: HttpWorkerRequest 建構函式是預設建構函式<xref:System.Web.HttpWorkerRequest>類別。</xref:System.Web.HttpWorkerRequest>

trans-unit.source: Sends the currently buffered response to the client.
trans-unit.target: 傳送至用戶端目前正在緩衝的回應。

trans-unit.source: The method to call when a corresponding asynchronous operation completes.
trans-unit.target: 要對應之非同步作業完成時呼叫的方法。

trans-unit.source: A user-provided object that distinguishes this particular asynchronous flush operation from other requests.
trans-unit.target: 使用者提供的物件，可區別這個特定非同步清除作業從其他要求。

trans-unit.source: The worker request buffers the status, headers, and response body until an asynchronous flush operation is initiated.
trans-unit.target: 起始非同步的清除作業之前，背景工作要求緩衝處理的狀態、 標頭和回應內文。

trans-unit.source: If the underlying <xref href="System.Web.HttpWorkerRequest"></xref> object supports asynchronous flush and this method is called from an asynchronous module event or asynchronous handler, the send operation is performed asynchronously.
trans-unit.target: 如果基礎<xref href="System.Web.HttpWorkerRequest"></xref>物件支援非同步清除和從非同步模組事件或非同步處理常式會呼叫這個方法，傳送作業則會以非同步方式執行。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the implementation performs a synchronous flush operation.
trans-unit.target: 否則，實作所執行的同步的清除作業。

trans-unit.source: Begins an asynchronous read operation of the request entity body.
trans-unit.target: 開始非同步的讀取的作業要求實體本文。

trans-unit.source: The buffer to read the data into.
trans-unit.target: 要讀取資料的緩衝區。

trans-unit.source: The byte offset in the buffer at which to begin writing data.
trans-unit.target: 中要開始將資料寫入緩衝區的位元組位移。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of bytes to read.
trans-unit.target: 要讀取的位元組數目上限。

trans-unit.source: The method to call when a corresponding asynchronous operation completes.
trans-unit.target: 要對應之非同步作業完成時呼叫的方法。

trans-unit.source: A user-provided object that distinguishes this particular asynchronous read from other requests.
trans-unit.target: 從其他要求使用者提供的物件，可區別這個特定非同步讀取。

trans-unit.source: Begins an asynchronous read operation of the request entity body.
trans-unit.target: 開始非同步的讀取的作業要求實體本文。

trans-unit.source: Terminates the connection with the client.
trans-unit.target: 終止與用戶端的連線。

trans-unit.source: Waits for the pending asynchronous flush operation to complete.
trans-unit.target: 等候暫止的非同步排清作業完成。

trans-unit.source: A reference to the pending asynchronous request.
trans-unit.target: 暫止的非同步要求的參考。

trans-unit.source: Used by the runtime to notify the <xref href="System.Web.HttpWorkerRequest"></xref> that request processing for the current request is complete.
trans-unit.target: 執行階段用來通知<xref href="System.Web.HttpWorkerRequest"></xref>的處理已完成目前的要求。

trans-unit.source: Waits for the pending asynchronous read operation to complete.
trans-unit.target: 等候暫止非同步讀取作業完成。

trans-unit.source: A reference to the pending asynchronous request.
trans-unit.target: 暫止的非同步要求的參考。

trans-unit.source: The number of bytes that have been read from the stream.
trans-unit.target: 已經從資料流讀取的位元組數目。

trans-unit.source: Sends all pending response data to the client.
trans-unit.target: 將所有暫止的回應資料傳送至用戶端。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this is the last time response data will be flushed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果這是最後一次回應資料會排清。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Returns the virtual path to the currently executing server application.
trans-unit.target: 傳回目前執行的伺服器應用程式的虛擬路徑。

trans-unit.source: The virtual path of the current application.
trans-unit.target: 目前的應用程式的虛擬路徑。

trans-unit.source: Returns the physical path to the currently executing server application.
trans-unit.target: 傳回目前執行的伺服器應用程式的實體路徑。

trans-unit.source: The physical path of the current application.
trans-unit.target: 目前的應用程式的實體路徑。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, returns the application pool ID for the current URL.
trans-unit.target: 當在衍生類別中覆寫時，傳回目前 URL 之應用程式集區識別碼。

trans-unit.source: Always returns null.
trans-unit.target: 永遠傳回 null。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of bytes read in from the client.
trans-unit.target: 取得從用戶端讀取的位元組數目。

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_Long" name="Long" href=""></xref> containing the number of bytes read.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_Long" name="Long" href=""> </xref>包含讀取的位元組數目。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets the certification fields (specified in the X.509 standard) from a request issued by the client.
trans-unit.target: 當在衍生類別中覆寫時，取得憑證欄位 （X.509 標準中所指定） 從用戶端所發出的要求。

trans-unit.source: If no certificate is sent, the <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.ClientCertificate%2A> collection returns empty.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有憑證會傳送，<xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.ClientCertificate%2A>會傳回空集合。</xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.ClientCertificate%2A>

trans-unit.source: A byte array containing the stream of the entire certificate content.
trans-unit.target: 位元組陣列，包含全部憑證內容的資料流。

trans-unit.source: Gets the certificate issuer, in binary format.
trans-unit.target: 取得憑證簽發者，以二進位格式。

trans-unit.source: A byte array containing the certificate issuer expressed in binary format.
trans-unit.target: 位元組陣列，包含以二進位格式表示的憑證簽發者。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, returns the <xref:System.Text.Encoding> object in which the client certificate was encoded.
trans-unit.target: 當在衍生類別中覆寫時，會傳回<xref:System.Text.Encoding>物件中已編碼的用戶端憑證。</xref:System.Text.Encoding>

trans-unit.source: The certificate encoding, expressed as an integer.
trans-unit.target: 憑證編碼方式，以整數表示。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets a <xref uid="langword_csharp_PublicKey" name="PublicKey" href=""></xref> object associated with the client certificate.
trans-unit.target: 當在衍生類別中覆寫時，取得<xref uid="langword_csharp_PublicKey" name="PublicKey" href=""></xref>物件相關聯的用戶端憑證。

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_PublicKey" name="PublicKey" href=""></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_PublicKey" name="PublicKey" href=""></xref> object.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets the date when the certificate becomes valid.
trans-unit.target: 當在衍生類別中覆寫時，取得憑證生效的日期。

trans-unit.source: The date varies with international settings.
trans-unit.target: 日期會因為國際設定而有所不同。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.DateTime> object representing when the certificate becomes valid.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.DateTime>物件，代表當憑證生效。</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: Gets the certificate expiration date.
trans-unit.target: 取得憑證到期日。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.DateTime> object representing the date that the certificate expires.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.DateTime>物件，表示在憑證到期的日期。</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, returns the ID of the current connection.
trans-unit.target: 當在衍生類別中覆寫時，會傳回目前連接的識別碼。

trans-unit.source: Always returns 0.
trans-unit.target: 一律傳回 0。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, returns the virtual path to the requested URI.
trans-unit.target: 當在衍生類別中覆寫時，傳回要求的 URI 的虛擬路徑。

trans-unit.source: The path to the requested URI.
trans-unit.target: 要求的 uri 路徑。

trans-unit.source: Returns the physical file path to the requested URI (and translates it from virtual path to physical path: for example, "/proj1/page.aspx" to "c:\dir\page.aspx")
trans-unit.target: 要求的 uri 會傳回的實體檔案路徑 (並將它從虛擬路徑轉譯至實體路徑:，例如"/ proj1/page.aspx"至"c:\dir\page.aspx")

trans-unit.source: The translated physical file path to the requested URI.
trans-unit.target: 要求的 URI 已翻譯實體檔案路徑。

trans-unit.source: That is, for the path /virdir/page.html/tail, the <xref uid="langword_csharp_GetPathInfo" name="GetPathInfo" href=""></xref> value is /tail.
trans-unit.target: 也就是說，針對路徑 /virdir/page.html/tail， <xref uid="langword_csharp_GetPathInfo" name="GetPathInfo" href=""> </xref>值是 /tail。

trans-unit.source: Returns the portion of the HTTP request body that has already been read.

trans-unit.source: Gets the corresponding Event Tracking for Windows trace ID for the current request.
trans-unit.target: 取得目前要求的對應 Windows 事件追蹤的追蹤識別碼。

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET requests execute with the same trace ID as the corresponding IIS request.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 要求執行含有對應的 IIS 要求相同的追蹤識別碼。

trans-unit.source: This facilitates tracking a request throughout its lifetime, starting with the HTTP.SYS kernel-mode HTTP listener, through the IIS service, and into the ASP.NET system.
trans-unit.target: 這有助於追蹤整個存留期間，從 HTTP 要求。SYS 核心模式 HTTP 接聽程式，透過 IIS 服務，並於 ASP.NET 系統。

trans-unit.source: The IDs provided by IIS differ based on the platform and service pack level.
trans-unit.target: 平台和 service pack 層級上有所不同 IIS 所提供的識別碼。

trans-unit.source: A trace ID for the current ASP.NET request.
trans-unit.target: 目前 ASP.NET 要求的追蹤識別碼。
